short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide ratings on Letterboxd film pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web extension to hide other users' ratings on the Letterboxd platform in order to view a movie without bias. The extension will therefore hide the ratings on the movie pages (https://letterboxd.com/film/nameOfMovie/), on user profiles (https://letterboxd.com/userName) but also on the site's home page.
